nodes.text: OOM-87 was a B1-series battle droid who served in the Separatist Droid Army during the Clone Wars. During a battle on the planet Florrum, he was destroyed by Jedi younglings Zatt and Petro while making a report to General Grievous.
A B1 battle droid with masculine programming, OOM-87 had tan-colored plating and a pair of black photoreceptors. The droid also carried an E-5 blaster rifle and an imagecaster.
